solution_line_template: Randy spends {monthly_spending}*{months_per_year}=<<{monthly_spending}*{months_per_year}={yearly_spending}>>{yearly_spending} dollars in a year.
Randy will have {initial_amount}-{yearly_spending}=<<{initial_amount}-{yearly_spending}={final_amount}>>{final_amount} dollars in his piggy bank after a year.
